mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_pharmacopoeia_information ( cat_code, atlas, variety_desc, feature, difference, other_aspect ) VALUES (#{cat_code}, #{atlas}, #{variety_desc}, #{feature}, #{difference}, #{other_aspect} )
mapper.update: UPDATE km_pharmacopoeia_information SET atlas = #{atlas},variety_desc = #{variety_desc},feature = #{feature}, difference = #{difference}, other_aspect = #{other_aspect} WHERE cat_code = #{variety_id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, cat_code, name, source, variety, detailed_content, b.status, b.fail_opinion FROM km_pharmacopoeia_information a LEFT JOIN km_audit b ON a.id = b.object_id AND b.km_type = 6 WHERE cat_code = #{id}
